clinical_study.brief_title: Tear Dynamics After Restasis Treatment in Dry Eye Patients
clinical_study.official_title: Tear Dynamics After Restasis Treatment in Dry Eye Patients Phase II Clinical Trial and Phase IIb 6-month Follow-up After Discontinuation of Study Treatment

brief_summary.textblock: Observe the changes of tear volume in dry eye patients after Restasis treatment of 3 months and during 6-month follow-up after discontinuation of study treatment.

detailed_description.textblock: Using an imaging device name optical coherence tomography to image the tear volume in dry eye patients before and after Restasis treatment.

primary_outcome.measure: Increase in tear volume after the 3-month treatment and returned to baseline during 6-month follow-up after discontinuation of study treatment.
primary_outcome.time_frame: 3 months for treatment and follow-up of 6 months after discontinuation of study treatment.

primary_outcome.description: Significant increase in tear meniscus volume was found in patients after 3 months of treatment.

study_pop.textblock: dry eye patients more than 18 yrs old
